description.value: Log time on tickets manually with optional parameters.
description.title: app description

total_time_field_id.label: Time Field ID
total_time_field_id.helpText: The ID of a custom numeric field that will hold the total time.

billable_time_field_id.label: ID of Billable Time field
billable_time_field_id.helpText: Optional: a custom numeric ticket field for storing cumulative billable time.

external_time_field_id.label: ID of External Time field
external_time_field_id.helpText: Optional: a custom numeric ticket field for storing cumulative external time.

date_field_id.label: ID of Date field
date_field_id.helpText: If one does not exist, create a custom text ticket field for storing dates.

fail.value: failed to fecth information from the server
fail.title: fetch failure
